name: Global Summit and Expo on Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering-2021
content: We take great pleasure to invite our Global Summit and Expo on Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering GSEAME2021 is going to be held on October 18-20, 2021 at Valencia, Spain. GSEAME-2021 aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers and research scholars to exchange and share their experiences and research results on all aspects of Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering. It also provides a premier interdisciplinary platform for researchers, practitioners and educators to present and discuss the most recent innovations, trends, and concerns as well as practical challenges encountered and solutions adopted in the fields of Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering.
